member.name: CD3D11_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC.CD3D11_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC structure that is initialized with a structure.
member.param: Address of the structure that initializes the CD3D11_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC structure.

member.name: CD3D11_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC.CD3D11_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC structure that is initialized with values.
member.param: A -typed value that specifies the resource type of the view.
A -typed value that specifies the viewing format.
The index of the mipmap level to use mip slice. FirstElement for .

param.name: firstArraySlice
param.para: The index of the first element to use in an array of elements.

member.param: Number of elements in the array. WSize for .

member.name: CD3D11_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC.CD3D11_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC structure that is initialized with values.
member.param: A pointer to a ID3D11Buffer interface for a buffer.
A DXGI_FORMAT-typed value that specifies the viewing format.
Number of bytes between the beginning of the buffer and the first element to access.
Total number of elements in the view.

member.name: CD3D11_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC.CD3D11_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC structure that is initialized with D3D11_TEX1D_RTV or D3D11_TEX1D_ARRAY_RTV values.
member.param: A pointer to a ID3D11Texture1D interface for a 1D texture.
A D3D11_RTV_DIMENSION-typed value that specifies the resource type of the view.
A DXGI_FORMAT-typed value that specifies the viewing format.
The index of the mipmap level to use mip slice.
The index of the first element to use in an array of elements.
Number of elements in the array.

member.name: CD3D11_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC.CD3D11_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC structure that is initialized with 2D texture values.
member.param: A pointer to a ID3D11Texture2D interface for a 2D texture.
A D3D11_RTV_DIMENSION-typed value that specifies the resource type of the view.
A DXGI_FORMAT-typed value that specifies the viewing format.
The index of the mipmap level to use mip slice.
The index of the first element to use in an array of elements.
Number of elements in the array.

member.name: CD3D11_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC.CD3D11_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC structure that is initialized with 3D texture values.
member.param: A pointer to a ID3D11Texture3D interface for a 3D texture.
A DXGI_FORMAT-typed value that specifies the viewing format.
The index of the mipmap level to use mip slice.
First depth level to use.
Number of depth levels to use in the render-target view, starting from firstWSlice. A value of -1 indicates all of the slices along the w axis, starting from firstWSlice.

member.name: CD3D11_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC.CD3D11_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of an uninitialized CD3D11_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC structure.

member.name: CD3D11_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC
member.summary: Represents a render-target view and provides convenience methods for creating render-target views.
